entry.title: $2400 // $2400 - 1BR - Elevator Building - Open Plan - Lex & 100th - 625 SqFt
entry.content:
$2400 Bright 1BR Apartment in Friendly Elevator Building available immediately!

Modern construction with spacious open plan.
Fabulous kitchen with granite counter-tops, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher opening into a sunny living room with all hardwood flooring; cable/internet ready
Heat and Hot Water Included. A/C units installed.
FREE Laundry facility in building.

Great Neighborhood: 4 blocks to Central park, subway (Lex Ave; 2nd Ave Lines), grocery stores, Mount Sinai, and Metropolitan Hospitals.
Great Local Restaurants! Citibike 1 block away! Cross-Fit Gym Next Door.
Must see!!
5th Floor of a 6 floor elevator building.

Must have first month's rent + security
Interested in persons with good references
Sorry, no pets.
